name: 2021 6th International Conference on Intelligent Information Technology
content: Paper Publishingï¼š The accepted and registered papers will be published in Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8894-8), archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Excellent papers will be recommended for reviewing of publication in Journal of Advances in Information Technology (JAIT, ISSN:1798-2340) as a special issue, indexed by Scopus (Since 2020), Google Scholar, etc.
